com.myronmarston.util
Interface Publisher

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPublisher, SectionSettings, SelfSimilaritySettings, VoiceSettings
public interface Publisher

Interface for my own version of the Observer pattern, that overcomes some of the deficiencies of the Java librar implementation. This is an interface to allow implementation when the publisher class must inherit from an existing super class. AbstractPublisher provides a good default implementation and should be used in all other cases.

Method Summary
 void addSubscriber(Subscriber s)
          Adds a subscriber to the publisher.
 void notifySubscribers(java.lang.Object args)
          Notifies all subscribers, passing along the given arguments.
 void removeAllSubscribers()
          Removes all subscribers.
 void removeSubscriber(Subscriber s)
          Removes the given subscriber from the publisher.
